content: cable heart cup cozy thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size 3 5 wide materials worsted weight #4 yarn 4 5mm hook needle scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet skip -skip treble_crochet -treble/triple crochet st -stitch fp -front post chain -chain decrease -decrease single_crochet -single_crochet pattern notes this pattern is constructed in joining rounds # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches you are making a total of three cable hearts in the cup cozy 11 stitch repeat designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items cozy round 1 chain 33 slip_stitch to first chain to form a circle chain 1 single_crochet in each chain around join 33 round 2 skip first st half_double_crochet in each st around half_double_crochet in joining st join chain 1 33 for every round here and throughout you will continue to skip the first st of the round and place your final stitch in the joining stitch this helps keep the design from tilting you will always have 33 stitches in each round round 3 half_double_crochet in each st around join chain 1 round 4 *3 half_double_crochet fptc around a half_double_crochet post from r2 and two sts to the left 3 half_double_crochet fptc around the same post as before 3 half_double_crochet* 3 times join round 5 half_double_crochet in each st around join chain 1 round 6 *half_double_crochet fptc around first fptc from r4 7 half_double_crochet fptc around second fptc from r4 half_double_crochet* 3 times join round 7 half_double_crochet in each st around join chain 1 round 8 *3 half_double_crochet fptc-decrease first leg around first fptc from r6 second leg around a half_double_crochet post from r6 and two sts to the left 3 half_double_crochet fptc-decrease first leg around same post as before second leg around second fpdc from r6 3 half_double_crochet* 3 times join round 9 single_crochet in each st around join fasten_off and weave in ends here is a quick diagram as a visual reference for the cable work designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo enjoy your new cable heart cup cozy this pattern is extra special to me because i designed it to be my wedding favor if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
